CXMnow.io in the Azure Marketplace today, an online store providing applications and services for use on Microsoft Azure. The customer experience management (CXM) technology allows life sciences organizations with certain well-defined business needs to sign up online for a built-for-purpose customer engagement capability to use in their commercial or medical operations.
